description:
Fountain of Youth follows two estranged siblings (John Krasinski and Academy Award winner Natalie Portman) who partner on a global heist to find the mythological Fountain of Youth. They must use their knowledge of history to follow clues on an epic adventure that will change their lives and possibly lead to immortality.

author: IGN
description:
In today's Daily Fix:
It's the big day: the Nintendo Switch 2 Direct went live this morning and as expected we got a much deeper look at the Switch 2's hardware and features. Nintendo also gave details on the games lineup, with some major third-party games coming to the new console. One title that barely got a mention, but is one of the most anticipated games of the year, was Hollow Knight: Silksong, which is confirmed for 2025. Nintendo also revealed the release date and pricing for the Switch 2, along with the pre-order date. Sorry, it wasn't today as many hoped, but next week. So get your wallets ready, it's going to be an expensive day.

#IGN #Gaming #Nintendo
title: Hollow Knight: Silksong Release Confirmed for 2025 - IGN Daily Fix

description:
Meet Nora Vasconcellos in this behind-the-scenes video for Tony Hawk’s Pro Skater 3 + 4. Learn more about this new skater joining the roster of new Pros in the upcoming sports game. Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 3 + 4 returns, but revamped with more skaters, new parks, gnarlier tricks, music, and more. Tony Hawk's Pro Skater 3 + 4 will be available on Xbox One, Xbox Series X/S, PS5 (PlayStation 5), PS4 (PlayStation 4), Nintendo Switch, Battle.net, and PC (Steam) on July 11, 2025.

#IGN #Gaming
title: Tony Hawk’s Pro Skater 3 + 4 - Official Nora Vasconcellos Behind-The-Scenes Clip

author: IGN
description:
Don’t miss these Nintendo Switch 2 details! From new Nintendo Switch 2 games and tech to the Switch 2 release date and all-important Switch 2 price, the Nintendo Switch 2 Direct contained A LOT of exciting info on Nintendo’s new console. During the hour-long Nintendo Switch 2 Direct, filled with Switch 2 news and brand new Switch 2 game reveals, there may have been some important details you missed, so we’ve done our best to distill everything down to the key info you need to know.

Find out more about the Switch 2 specs, including details on the new Joy-Con 2 and the Nintendo Switch 2 Camera. We’re also going into detail on some of the Nintendo Switch 2 launch games such as Mario Kart World, The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild and Tears of the Kingdom Nintendo Switch 2 Editions, and more. Here are 95 new details you need to know about the Nintendo Switch 2.

#IGN #Gaming #Nintendo
title: Nintendo Switch 2: 95 New Details - Release Date, Price, Games and More!

author: IGN
description:
A Minecraft Movie, reviewed by Jesse Hassenger. Narrated by Max Scoville.

For a big-studio adaptation of a massively popular video-game, A Minecraft Movie lets a surprising amount of its director’s personality shine through. Napoleon Dynamite’s Jared Hess manages to fit some laugh-out-loud silliness into his Overworld saga before surrendering to the obligations of CG-driven fantasy adventure. Thematically, A Minecraft Movie offers a pat world-is-what-you-make-it lesson, but Jack Black and Jason Momoa in particular sell it with a lot of comic enthusiasm.

#IGN #Minecraft
title: A Minecraft Movie Review

title: Star Trek: Strange New Worlds Season 3 - Official Teaser Trailer (2025) Anson Mount, Rebecca Romijn

author: IGN
description: Check out the The Legend of Zelda Breath of the Wild Nintendo Switch 2 Edition and The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom Nintendo Switch 2 Edition. The new Switch 2 Edition features HDR support, higher framerates, and Zelda Notes. This new feature can be accessed via the Nintendo Switch app, exclusive to the Switch 2 editions. It features voice navigation for maps and support to share your creations.
title: The Legend of Zelda Breath of the Wild & Tears of the Kingdom - Nintendo Switch 2 Overview Trailer

author: IGN
description:
Get a quick look at Enter the Gungeon 2, the upcoming sequel to the bullet hell dungeon crawler. Enter the Gungeon 2 is coming soon to Nintendo Switch 2 and PC.

Battle through areas familiar and unknown as the ruined Gungeon reveals its secrets to those brave enough to enter. Discover, unlock, and master fantastic weaponry within its procedurally-generated halls and destroy the legions of Gundead pouring forth from within. Charge into dynamic battles against devilishly cute enemies, previously confined to the 2D plane, and delight as they are knocked around, tossed into the air, and thrown deep into pits.
title: Enter the Gungeon 2 - Official Reveal Teaser Trailer | Nintendo Switch 2 Direct

author: IGN
description:
Solve puzzles with friends on a deserted island on Survival Kids for the Nintendo Switch 2. Picture this: A dusty old attic, cobwebs, forgotten boxes and the faint smell of neglect. Four curious kids stumble upon an ancient, tattered map, sparking an unexpected adventure. Check out the Survival Kids reveal trailer for this upcoming co-op survival adventure game, available on Nintendo Switch 2 on June 5, 2025.

#IGN #Gaming #Nintendo
title: Survival Kids - Official Reveal Trailer | Nintendo Switch 2 Direct

author: IGN
description:
Conquer Warring States Japan under one banner. Check out the Nobunaga's Ambition: Awakening Complete Edition reveal trailer for this upcoming complete edition of the strategy game. Nobunaga's Ambition: Awakening Complete Edition features the base game and additional content, and includes additional content, such as new scenarios and other elements. Nobunaga's Ambition: Awakening Complete Edition will be available on Nintendo Switch 2 and PS5 (PlayStation 5) on June 5, 2025.

#Gaming #Games #Nintendo
title: Nobunaga's Ambition: Awakening Complete Edition - Official Reveal Trailer | Nintendo Switch 2 Direct

#IGN #Gaming #Nintendo

author: IGN
description:
Teens today are growing up in an unprecedented reality—a world shaped by the constant presence of social media, rapid digital advancements, and increasingly complex challenges. While they’re more connected than ever online, many report feelings of loneliness, isolation, and heightened anxiety.

This #DICE2025 talk explores the implications of these trends and how they can inform the creation of compelling, youth-focused content. With expertise spanning fantasy world-building, digital civility, and adolescent behavior, Sharon Tal Yguado (Astrid Entertainment) and Tami Bhaumik (Roblox) will share actionable insights to help creators and developers connect meaningfully with today’s teens.
 
It’s time to bust stereotypes like "Teens Only Want Fame and Attention,” ”Movies are Dead for Teens,“ "Teens Only Care About Viral Trends,” and labels such as "Skibidi Toilet Generation."
 
To learn more about the D.I.C.E. Summit, visit  https://www.dicesummit.org/

#IGN #Gaming
title: We Live in a Brave New World - What Teens Want (Astrid Entertainment & Roblox) | DICE 2025 Summit

author: IGN
description:
Don't miss the Street Fighter 6 Years 1-2 Edition Announcement Trailer for the hit fighting game developed by Capcom. This edition includes characters and stages released from Years 1 & 2, making a total of 26 characters, including their Outfit 1 Colors 3-10, and 20 stages. It's perfect for new players of all skill levels and interests looking to join the fight. Street Fighter 6 Years 1-2 Edition is launching on June 5 for Nintendo Switch 2 alongside PlayStation 4 (PS4), PlayStation 5 (PS5), Xbox Series X|S, and PC (Steam).

#StreetFighter #Gaming #Nintendo
title: Street Fighter 6 - Official Years 1-2 Edition Announcement Trailer | Nintendo Switch 2 Direct

author: IGN
description:
Customization is one of inZOI's best features, but if you're looking for more than what the in-game tools have to offer, modding is the way to go. Official mod support is planned for InZOI's May 2025 update, but with third-party mods, you can alter your experience right away. Here's how to download and install Nexus Mods for InZOI.

0:00 Intro
0:27 Set Up Instructions
1:15 Download and Install InZOI Mods
2:57 How to Manage Your InZOI Mods
4:05 More InZOI Tips

For more inZOI tips and tricks, check out our growing Wiki guide at https://www.ign.com/wikis/inzoi/
title: InZOI - How to Install Mods
